resources.string: Hi, due to budget cuts, our school isn\'t providing white board markers to teachers anymore! I have been ...

I am a math and science teacher at Corte Madera Middle School. I have been teaching since I graduated from college with a degree in Biology. This is my 3rd year teaching at Corte Madera, and my 5th year teaching overall.

My students are a diverse group of eighth graders who attend an urban, public elementary school in Northern California. My students come from a variety of socioeconomic and ethnic backgrounds and speak a variety of languages. They come to school with a broad range of learning experiences.My students are eager to learn and do their best. They want to be in school because they want to learn all they can to be successful one day. My students walk into our classroom every day full of life, ready to learn, and excited for what is in store for them that day!
